brusselator_2.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Subroutine to Initialize, calculate the RHS, and calculate Brusselator
00003 !
00004 ! x'=a+x*x*y-b*x-x
00005 ! y'=b*x-x*x*y
00006 !
00007 ! (du/dt)=(df/dx df/dy)*(u)
00008 ! (dv/dt) (dg/dx dg/dy) (v)
00009 !
00010 ! J=(b-1 a)
00011 !   (-b -a)
00012 !
00013 ! u'=1-4*u+u*u*v+ep*d^2u/dx^2
00014 ! v'=  3*u-u*u*v+ep*d^2v/dx^2
00015 ! where:
00016 ! u(x,t), v(x,t)
00017 ! u(0,t)=u(1,t)=1       v(0,t)=v(1,t)=3
00018 ! u(x,0)=1+sin(2*pi*x)  v(x,0)=3
00019 ! 
00020 !******************************************************************************
00021 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00022 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90        *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00023 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90     *CONTAINS VARIABLES AND ALLOCATION ROUTINES
00024 !******************************************************************************
00025       module Brusselator_mod
00026       
00027       use precision_vars,    only: wp,two,pi
00028       
00029       implicit none; save            
00030       
00031       private
00032       public :: Brusselator
00033       
00034       integer,  parameter :: vecl=64     ! total uvec length == 2*vecl
00035       real(wp), parameter :: xL=0.0_wp, xR=1.0_wp
00036       
00037       real(wp), dimension(vecl) :: x
00038       real(wp)                  :: dx
00039       
00040       integer,  dimension(10*vecl)  :: jDeriv2_p
00041       real(wp), dimension(10*vecl)  :: Deriv2_p
00042       integer,  dimension(vecl*2+1) :: iDeriv2_p
00043       
00044       contains
00045       
00046 !==============================================================================      
00047       subroutine Brusselator(nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00048 
00049       use control_variables, only: temporal_splitting,probname,Jac_case, &
00050      &                             tol,dt_error_tol,uvec,uexact,programstep
00051       use SBP_Coef_Module,   only: Define_CSR_Operators,D2_per,nnz_D2_per
00052       use unary_mod,         only: aplb
00053       use Jacobian_CSR_Mod,  only: Allocate_Jac_CSR_Storage
00054 !-----------------------VARIABLES----------------------------------------------
00055 
00056       !INIT vars
00057       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: ep
00058       real(wp), intent(inout) :: dt
00059       integer,  intent(  out) :: nveclen
00060       real(wp), intent(  out) :: tfinal
00061       integer,  intent(in   ) :: iDT
00062 
00063       !RHS vars
00064       real(wp), dimension(vecl*2), intent(  out) :: resE_vec,resI_vec
00065       real(wp), dimension(vecl*2)                :: dudt_Dx,dudt_Source
00066             
00067       !Jacob vars
00068       real(wp), intent(in   )       :: akk
00069       integer                       :: nnz_Jac
00070       real(wp), dimension(4*vecl)   :: Source      
00071       integer,  dimension(4*vecl)   :: jSource
00072       integer,  dimension(2*vecl+1) :: iSource,iwrk_Jac
00073       real(wp), dimension(12*vecl)  :: wrk_Jac
00074       integer,  dimension(12*vecl)  :: jwrk_Jac
00075       integer,  dimension(vecl)     :: iw
00076       integer                       :: ierr=0
00077 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078       
00079       Program_Step_Select: select case(programstep)
00080         !**Pre-initialization. Get problem name and vector length**
00081         case('INITIALIZE_PROBLEM_INFORMATION')
00082           nvecLen = 2*vecl
00083           probname='Brusselat'     
00084           tol=9.9e-11_wp  
00085           dt_error_tol=1.0e-13_wp
00086           Jac_case='SPARSE'
00087           
00088           call grid()
00089 
00090         !**Initialization of problem information**        
00091         case('SET_INITIAL_CONDITIONS')
00092           
00093           !Allocate derivative operators
00094           if(.not. allocated(D2_per))call Define_CSR_Operators(vecl,dx) 
00095            
00096           !Time information
00097           choose_dt: select case(temporal_splitting)
00098             case('IMPLICIT');dt = 0.045_wp/10**((iDT-1)/20.0_wp) ! timestep   
00099             case('IMEX')    ;dt = 0.00019_wp/10**((iDT-1)/20.0_wp) 
00100           end select choose_dt
00101           tfinal = 10.0_wp                   ! final time
00102  
00103           !**IC**
00104           uvec(1:2*vecl:2) = 1.0_wp+sin(two*pi*x(:))
00105           uvec(2:2*vecl:2) = 3.0_wp
00106       
00107           !**Exact Solution**
00108           uexact=exact_Bruss(ep)
00109           
00110         case('BUILD_RHS')
00111           call Bruss_dudt(uvec,dudt_Dx,dudt_Source,ep)
00112           choose_RHS_type: select case (Temporal_Splitting)
00113             case('IMPLICIT')
00114               resE_vec(:)=0.0_wp
00115               resI_vec(:)=dt*(dudt_Dx(:)+dudt_Source(:))
00116             case('IMEX')
00117               resE_vec(:)=dt*dudt_Dx(:)
00118               resI_vec(:)=dt*dudt_Source(:)
00119           end select choose_RHS_type
00120        
00121         case('BUILD_JACOBIAN')
00122           choose_Jac_type: select case(temporal_splitting)
00123             case('IMPLICIT')
00124               nnz_Jac=2*nnz_D2_per+vecl*2
00125               call Allocate_Jac_CSR_Storage(vecl*2,nnz_Jac)
00126               
00127               call Build_Source_Jac(uvec,Source,jSource,iSource)
00128               
00129               call aplb(vecl*2,vecl*2,1,Source,jSource,iSource,               &
00130      &                  Deriv2_p,jDeriv2_p,iDeriv2_p,                         &
00131      &                  wrk_Jac,jwrk_Jac,iwrk_Jac,nnz_Jac,iw,ierr)
00132               if (ierr/=0) then; print*,'Build Jac ierr=',ierr;stop;endif
00133               
00134               call Build_Jac(dt,akk,wrk_Jac,jwrk_Jac,iwrk_Jac,nnz_Jac)   
00135                   
00136             case('IMEX')
00137               nnz_Jac=vecl*4
00138               call Allocate_Jac_CSR_Storage(vecl*2,nnz_Jac)
00139               call Build_Source_Jac(uvec,Source,jSource,iSource)
00140               call Build_Jac(dt,akk,Source,jSource,iSource,nnz_Jac)
00141           end select choose_Jac_type
00142           
00143       end select Program_Step_select
00144       end subroutine Brusselator
00145 !==============================================================================
00146 !==============================================================================
00147 !==============================================================================
00148 ! PRODUCES GRID
00149       subroutine grid()
00150       integer :: i
00151       
00152       do i=1,vecl
00153         x(i)= xL + (xR-xL)*(i-1.0_wp)/(vecl)
00154       enddo
00155       
00156       dx=x(2)-x(1)
00157 
00158       end subroutine grid
00159 !==============================================================================
00160 ! RETURNS VECTOR WITH EXACT SOLUTION
00161       function exact_Bruss(eps)
00162 
00163       real(wp),                  intent(in) :: eps
00164 
00165       integer                               :: i
00166       real(wp), dimension(81,vecl*2+1)      :: ExactTot
00167       real(wp)                              :: diff
00168       real(wp), dimension(vecl*2)           :: exact_Bruss
00169 
00170       exact_Bruss(:)=0.0_wp
00171       
00172       !**Exact Solution** 
00173       open(unit=39,file='exact.Brusselator_64.data')
00174       rewind(39)
00175       do i=1,81
00176         read(39,*)ExactTot(i,1:vecl*2)
00177         ExactTot(i,vecl*2+1) = 1.0_wp/10**((i-1)/(10.0_wp))  !  used for 81 values of ep
00178       enddo
00179       do i=1,81
00180         diff = abs(ExactTot(i,vecl*2+1) - eps)
00181         if(diff <= 1.0e-10_wp)then
00182           exact_Bruss(:) = ExactTot(i,:vecl*2)
00183           exit
00184         endif
00185       enddo
00186 
00187       return
00188       end function exact_Bruss
00189 
00190 !==============================================================================
00191 ! DEFINES RHS 
00192       subroutine Bruss_dUdt(vec,dudt_deriv2,dudt_source,eps)
00193       
00194       use SBP_Coef_Module, only: D2_per,jD2_per,iD2_per,nnz_D2_per
00195       use unary_mod,       only: dperm
00196       use matvec_module,   only: amux
00197 
00198       real(wp), dimension(:),      intent(in   ) :: vec
00199       real(wp), dimension(vecl*2), intent(  out) :: dudt_deriv2,dudt_source
00200       real(wp),                    intent(in   ) :: eps
00201      
00202       real(wp), dimension(vecl)                  :: u,v
00203       integer,  dimension(vecl*2)                :: j_perm
00204       integer                                    :: i      
00205       integer,  dimension(vecl*2+1)              :: iDeriv2      
00206       real(wp), dimension(2*nnz_D2_per)          :: Deriv2
00207       integer,  dimension(2*nnz_D2_per)          :: jDeriv2
00208             
00209       u=vec(1:vecl*2:2); v=vec(2:vecl*2:2)
00210 
00211 ! ---------------------- Dx part of dudt --------------------------------------
00212       Deriv2(:nnz_D2_per)    = eps*D2_per(:)
00213       Deriv2(nnz_D2_per+1:)  = eps*D2_per(:)
00214       iDeriv2(:vecl)         = iD2_per(:)
00215       iDeriv2(vecl+1:)       = iD2_per(:)+iD2_per(vecl+1)-1
00216       jDeriv2(:nnz_D2_per)   = jD2_per(:)
00217       jDeriv2(nnz_D2_per+1:) = jD2_per(:)+vecl
00218 
00219 ! permute matrix into:
00220 ! |x| |
00221 ! | |x|
00222       j_perm(1)=1
00223       j_perm(vecl+1)=2
00224       do i=2,vecl*2
00225         if (i==vecl+1) cycle
00226         j_perm(i)=j_perm(i-1) + 2
00227       enddo
00228  
00229       ! permute D2's matrix   
00230       call dperm(vecl*2,Deriv2,jDeriv2,iDeriv2,Deriv2_p, &
00231      &           jDeriv2_p,iDeriv2_p,j_perm,j_perm,1)
00232 
00233       ! get dudt     
00234       call amux(vecl*2,vec,dudt_Deriv2,Deriv2_p,jDeriv2_p,iDeriv2_p)   
00235 
00236 !----------------------  Source part of dudt  ---------------------------------      
00237       dudt_Source(1:2*vecl:2)=1.0_wp-4.0_wp*u(:)+u(:)*u(:)*v(:)
00238       dudt_Source(2:2*vecl:2)=       3.0_wp*u(:)-u(:)*u(:)*v(:)
00239 
00240       end subroutine Bruss_dUdt
00241 !==============================================================================
00242 !  CREATES SOURCE JACOBIAN
00243       subroutine Build_Source_Jac(vec,Source_p,jSource_p,iSource_p)
00244       
00245       use unary_mod, only: dperm
00246 
00247       real(wp), dimension(:),        intent(in   ) :: vec
00248       real(wp), dimension(4*vecl),   intent(  out) :: Source_p
00249       integer,  dimension(4*vecl),   intent(  out) :: jSource_p
00250       integer,  dimension(2*vecl+1), intent(  out) :: iSource_p
00251       
00252       real(wp), dimension(4*vecl)   :: Source      
00253       integer,  dimension(4*vecl)   :: jSource
00254       integer,  dimension(2*vecl+1) :: iSource
00255       
00256       integer,  dimension(vecl*2)   :: j_perm
00257       real(wp), dimension(vecl)     :: u,v
00258       integer                       :: i
00259 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00260       
00261       u=vec(1:vecl*2:2); v=vec(2:vecl*2:2)
00262      
00263 ! Set Source Jacobian
00264       Source(1:vecl*2:2)=-4.0_wp+2.0_wp*u(:)*v(:)
00265       Source(2:vecl*2:2)=2.0_wp*u(:)
00266       Source(vecl*2+1:vecl*4:2)=3.0_wp-2.0_wp*u(:)*v(:)
00267       Source(vecl*2+2:vecl*4:2)=-u(:)*u(:)
00268       iSource(:) = (/ (i, i=1, vecl*4+1,2) /)
00269       do i=1,vecl
00270         jSource(2*i-1)        = i
00271         jSource(2*i)          = vecl+i
00272         jSource(2*i-1+vecl*2) = i
00273         jSource(2*i+vecl*2)   = vecl+i
00274       enddo
00275     
00276       j_perm(1)=1
00277       j_perm(vecl+1)=2
00278       do i=2,vecl*2
00279         if (i==vecl+1) cycle
00280         j_perm(i)=j_perm(i-1) + 2
00281       enddo
00282 
00283       ! permute source's matrix    
00284       call dperm(vecl*2,Source,jSource,iSource,Source_p,jSource_p,iSource_p,  &
00285      &             j_perm,j_perm,1)
00286 
00287       end subroutine Build_Source_Jac
00288 !==============================================================================
00289 ! SET JAC TO GLOBAL    
00290       subroutine Build_Jac(dt,akk,a,ja,ia,nnz_Jac)
00291       
00292       use unary_mod,        only: aplsca
00293       use Jacobian_CSR_Mod, only: iaJac,jaJac,aJac
00294       
00295       real(wp),               intent(in) :: dt,akk
00296       real(wp), dimension(:), intent(in) :: a
00297       integer,  dimension(:), intent(in) :: ja,ia
00298       integer,                intent(in) :: nnz_Jac
00299       
00300       integer,  dimension(vecl*2)   :: iw    
00301       real(wp), dimension(nnz_Jac)  :: wrk
00302       integer,  dimension(nnz_Jac)  :: jwrk
00303       integer,  dimension(vecl*2+1) :: iwrk
00304       integer                       :: nnz_a
00305       
00306       nnz_a=size(a)
00307        
00308       wrk(:nnz_a)=-akk*dt*a(:)
00309       wrk(nnz_a+1:)=0.0_wp
00310       jwrk(:nnz_a)=ja(:)
00311       jwrk(nnz_a+1:)=0
00312       iwrk(:)=ia(:)  
00313       
00314       call aplsca(vecl*2,wrk,jwrk,iwrk,1.0_wp,iw)      
00315 
00316       iaJac=iwrk
00317       jaJac=jwrk
00318       aJac = wrk
00319 
00320       end subroutine Build_Jac
00321 !==============================================================================    
00322       end module Brusselator_mod
